faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about ChroniCaree

what.question: What is ChroniCaree?
what.answer: ChroniCaree is a comprehensive digital platform designed to revolutionize chronic disease care. We connect patients, families and healthcare professionals through intelligent tools for monitoring, education and communication.

how.question: How does the platform work?
how.answer: Patients daily record their symptoms, vital signs and medications through our intuitive app. Our AI analyzes this data to detect risk patterns and send automatic alerts to the medical team when necessary.

diseases.question: What chronic diseases does it support?
diseases.answer: We currently support diabetes, hypertension, chronic kidney disease, COPD, heart failure and rheumatoid arthritis. We constantly add new conditions based on our users' needs.

security.question: Is my medical information secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We comply with the highest security standards including HIPAA, end-to-end encryption, and regular security audits. Your information is protected with banking-grade technology.

cost.question: How much does it cost to use ChroniCaree?
cost.answer: For patients, ChroniCaree is free when your hospital or clinic has an active subscription. For institutions, we offer flexible plans starting at $299/month. Contact us for a personalized quote.

support.question: What kind of technical support do you offer?
support.answer: We offer multichannel support: live chat, email, phone and video calls. Our support team includes healthcare professionals who understand the specific needs of the medical sector.
